column2: <START> What a nice guy and a true Olympian with a great attitude
<START> Mirza you spoke excellent English  and an all round good guy Great relaxed interview Two non native English speakers having a great conversation in English

<START> Good that people around the world especially now with the Olympians get to see and learn for themselves first hand what China really is  a total opposite of what the Western media deliberately portray China of
